hat.X-ray Goggles.name: X-Ray Goggles
hat.X-ray Goggles.description:
Let's you see and place underground objects.
(Only certain objects can be placed underground. They will say so in their description.)
hat.Binoculars.name: Binoculars
hat.Binoculars.description:
Let's you see and place elevated objects.
(Only certain objects can be placed elevated. They will say so in their description.)
